attributes.action: Introduce a Red Card and Yellow Card system to tackle Anti Social Yobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This will be a fairly effective Police warning system that will tackle Anti-Social Yobs, Underage Drinkers, Swearing and Shouting in a public place. It will work like this the first warning will result in a Police caution and a Yellow card and the second warning will result in a Red Card if they are being persistant carry on. And if they dont stop after the red card the Police Issue
a ASBO Anti-Social Behavior Order followed by an Arrest for Section 5 Public Order Offense.
